prompt_base: hyperdetailed cinematic portrait of a massive, imposing gray alien warrior, giant black void eyes, smooth yet textured gray skin, thick muscular neck, wearing red and black Pride Trooper combat suit, fierce expression
feature_prompt: RAW photo, 8k dslr, extreme muscle definition, visible veins, high contrast volumetric lighting, subtle wet sheen on the gray skin, detailed texture on the suit fabric
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, CGI, plastic texture, smooth gray skin, solid color, doll, action figure, flat lighting, bad anatomy, blurry, poorly defined muscles
